MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA21 postcode area of Saltcoats. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:30pm. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:42pm on Monday, 04 January 2021
